altTitles.ja-ro: 治して♥ダークエルフちゃん

description.en:
Sticky Sweet Monster Girls That Are Hot to the Touch!

A robotic tsundere maid, a horny dark elf, and a seductive spirit are just a few of the fantasy ladies that are ready to eat you up in Kirekawa's first book!

From a succubus leading you into a pit of pleasure to an elf who loves exhibitionism, and toss in a handjob from a cow girl and a boobjob from a foxy deity, and these fantasy heroines are ready to tenderly and aggressively milk men of all shapes and sizes!

Hot Honey Ecstasy by Kirekawa is a spicy taste of sweet monster girls that will gobble you up if you're not careful. Featuring a five-star course with ten appetizing chapters, including a steamy bonus chapter of a duo of helpless cuties with a side of tentacles, Hot Honey Ecstasy will satisfy your sweet tooth even if you can't handle another bite!

[Source: Fakku!](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/hot-honey-ecstasy-english) 

1. Elf na Kanojo to Doki Doki Date (エルフな彼女とドキドキデート, An Exciting Date with My Elven Girlfriend); Comic Unreal 2019-08
2. Tsundere Imouto Type no Maid Android wa Goshujin-sama ni Kamawaretai (ツンデレ妹タイプのメイドアンドロイドはご主人様に構われたい, The Tsundere Little Sister Maid Android Wants Attention); Comic Unreal 2019-12
3. Naoshite Dark Elf-chan (治してダークエルフちゃん, Heal Me! ❤ Dark Elf-chan); Comic Unreal 2020-08
4. Wasurerarenai Akimatsuri (忘れられない秋祭り, Unforgettable Fall Festival); Comic Unreal 2020-10
5. Ikenie ☆ Dreamer (イケニエ☆ドリーマー, Offertory☆Dreamer); Comic Unreal 2021-02
6. Genki wo Otodoke ♥ Ushi Musume (元気をお届け♥牛娘, Happiness Delivery! ❤ Cow Girl); Bessatsu Comic Unreal Jingai Onee-san ni Yoru Amayakashi Sakusei Hen Vol. 1
7. Tsukareru Shin Seikatsu (憑かれる新生活, A Haunting New Lifestyle); Comic Unreal 2020-04
8. Yuusha to Watashi to Inma-chan (勇者と私と淫魔ちゃん, Me, the Hero, and the Tiny Succubus); Comic Unreal 2018-12
9. Yuusha to Watashi to Inma-chan: Gojitsu-dan (勇者と私と淫魔ちゃん-後日談-, Me, the Hero, and the Tiny Succubus - After Story); kakioroshi
10. Majo to Ouji to Ayatsuri Mahou (魔女と王子と操り魔法, The Witch, the Prince, and the Mind Control Spell); Comic Unreal 2018-06
